description: This file defines the MainPagerAdapter class, which extends FragmentStateAdapter to provide fragment management for a view pager within an Android application. It includes methods to create fragments based on position and specify the total number of items.

classes.name: MainPagerAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for managing fragments in a ViewPager2, providing fragments for positions 0 and 1, corresponding to HomeFragment and CategoriesFragment respectively.

methods.name: MainPagerAdapter
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the adapter with a FragmentActivity.

methods.name: createFragment
methods.description: Creates and returns a fragment based on the position argument. Position 0 returns HomeFragment, position 1 returns CategoriesFragment, default also returns HomeFragment.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of fragments managed by the adapter, which is 2.
